title: [ALL RANKS] Iscariot Esports Recruitment

embed.description: We are Iscariot Esports and are currently looking for players for team's in EVERY DIVISION. Staff position also available if interested. Positions are limited but we will be reviewing each candidate. (Selection process will include a friendly scrim).

body:
Hello All,


Iscariot Esports is looking for a dedicated players to fill our teams. Their are spots open currently in 3 teams in the OCE region. (ALL ranks ENCOURAGED), as well as players of all positions for substitute roles.
We will be entering tournaments and we are looking to play a part in the development of the OCE community and with your help we will be achieve that.

If you are interested please complete this form: https://goo.gl/forms/X8uK2zivhmsXhAEx1


We will be contacting suitable applicants within 2 weeks.

-Sobaken{{champion:85}}

replies.body: Filled out the form. Could you go into a little more detail on what your organisation is, exactly, and what you're looking to achieve?

Hi Lnky,

Thank you for taking your time out to complete the application!

We have 3 Divisions (Teams) in our Organisation, each having its own requirements and goals.
Each team has its unique name and logo but is all owned by Iscariot Esports.

Team 1 
- Team 1 will be our OOL team, mostly aimed at Diamond+ players with a desire to play in the OCS/OPL.
Players with previous team experience is preferred but it is not a requirement. Players from this team may
drop into Team 2, if seen as severely under-performing.


Team 2
- This team will also be an OOL team, but is more suited towards players without much team experience and 
looking to try out the OCE competitive scene. Any player that is Gold+ may join this team. Players may get offered a chance
to move up into Team 1 if they display strong improvement.


Team 3 
- This will be a team that is mainly for players that want a better grasp of how to effectively communicate with teammates.
Any player wanting to play in and experiencing a team environment while also building there skills as individuals is welcome! 
ANY player in ANY rank may join this team. As is the same for all other teams, players in this team also have the opportunity to move up 
into more competitive teams within the organization.


The main thing we ask from you before joining any of our team is COMMITMENT.

Best of luck

- Sobaken
